mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_59_zdzskjcsj ( voice, vis, hourr, bg, warmList, updateTime, next3day, wd, fireLlevel, t, obtid, humidity, stationName, hour24r, countryName, ws ) VALUES
( #{item.voice}, #{item.vis}, #{item.hourr}, #{item.bg}, #{item.warmList}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.next3day}, #{item.wd}, #{item.fireLlevel}, #{item.t}, #{item.obtid}, #{item.humidity}, #{item.stationName}, #{item.hour24r}, #{item.countryName}, #{item.ws} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_59_zdzskjcsj where SJWXHXPMC=#{SJWXHXPMC} and RKSJ = #{RKSJ}
